Package ca.phon.app.session.editor.view.ipa_validation

Class ValidationEditorView

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
ca.phon.app.session.editor.EditorView
ca.phon.app.session.editor.view.ipa_validation.ValidationEditorView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtendable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ValidationEditorView
extends EditorView
Editor view used to validate double-blind transcriptions. References the extension AlternativeTranscript in IPATranscript objects for the IPA Target and IPA Actual tiers or a Record.
See Also:
Serialized Form
